resources.string: Each tab in this app will guide you through what you need to get started using the LoopBack Node for your Mobile App.
Just follow the tips and uncomment the code for each feature.
Press \'Refresh\' to load the local ListView.
Congratulations, you created a model instance on the server. Press \'Refresh\' to update the local ListView.
Congratulations, you updated a model instance on the server. Press \'Refresh\' to update the local ListView.
Congratulations, you deleted a model instance on the server. Press \'Refresh\' to update the local ListView.
It looks like your server isn\'t running. From the sls-sample-app folder start the server with\n\'slc run app.js\'\nand try again.
